scripts.pages:build: npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/assets/_worker.js && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/assets/ && echo '{ "version": 1, "include": ["/*"], "exclude": ["/_next/static/*", "/favicon.ico", "/*.png", "/*.jpg", "/*.jpeg", "/*.svg", "/*.css"] }' > .open-next/assets/_routes.json
